medical_history.chief_complaint: Epigastric pain radiating to the back and vomiting.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient developed epigastric pain that became acutely worse after lunch today, along with vomiting after all PO intake.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Hypertension, hyperlipidemia, esophageal spasm many years ago, previous right hip replacement and left shoulder arthroscopy.
medical_history.social_history: The patient drinks one scotch nightly and no more than 3 scotches in a day. Denies any changes in lifestyle habits.
